title: Drawing, "Valley With a Stream and Houses, near Guaranda, Ecuador", June 4, 1857
medium: Graphite, brush and white gouache on greenish gray paper
markings:
Recto:  Stamped in ink, at lower left: Lugt 457c
Verso:  Stamped in ink, at lower center:  Lugt 457d
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite with colors throughout:   Brown / yellow / green / several tones/ Emerald; and again, at lower right:  Near Guaranda June 4th, 57
description: Horizontal view of a valley, at left, with mountain ranges rising toward the right: a stream, with houses near its bank, flows in lower left corner, with more houses scattered throughout the valley.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Valley With a Stream and Houses, near Guaranda, Ecuador", June 4, 1857.
June 4, 1857. Graphite, brush and white gouache on greenish gray paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-204.
